Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have noticed enlarging and multiplying red spots and bumps on my tongue, inside my mouth, on my nose, lower lip, and fingertips.
Are these spots and bumps painful or itchy?
No, they are not painful or itchy.
Have you recently started any new medications or been diagnosed with any health conditions?
No, I haven't started any new medications or been diagnosed with any new health conditions recently.
Do you have any other symptoms such as fever, joint pain, or vision problems?
No, I don't have symptoms like fever, joint pain, or vision problems.
Do you have any history of gastrointestinal issues or unexplained iron deficiency anemia?
Yes, I have iron-deficiency anemia that has not responded to iron supplementation.
Final Diagnosis: Plummer-Vinson syndrome

I have been seeing an increase in the number and size of red spots and bumps on my tongue, inside my mouth, on my nose, lower lip, and fingertips. Also, I've been experiencing frequent nosebleeds since childhood.

Final Diagnosis: Hereditary Hemorrhagic Telangiectasia (Osler-Weber-Rendu syndrome)
